page.title: 15SHOPPING_IRONBRIDGE
page.content: On Friday there is a traditional market in Ironbridge Square, selling fruit, vegetables, small household items and bric-a-brac. People living around this area mainly get their shopping from Telford Town Centre. In Ironbridge and Coalbrookdale there are craft shops where you can buy rubbers, stickers, badges and crafted gifts. The shops mainly sell to the tourists. There are four antique shops selling furniture, clocks, coins, pottery and glass. There are three snack bars where you can have light snacks and three restaurants. There are 17 pubs, inns, hotels and wine bars. Buses go to Wellington, Telford Town Centre, Bridgnorth, Wolverhampton, Shrewsbury and Birmingham.
